title: Affordable Housing West Los Angeles MOVE IN SPECIAL
posting_body: This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 330 Sq.
Welcome to your new home at Studio Arnaz Apartments!
Studio Arnaz Apartments is steps away from Cedars Sinai Hospital and is just minutes from Rodeo Drive and UCLA.
Grab a bite to eat at countless high-end restaurants and find limitless shopping at The Beverly Center, Beverly Connection, and The Beverly Grove.
It’s a great choice to live for those who love to indulge in the finer things that Beverly Hills has to offer.
Studio Arnaz is an affordable community that has income and rent restrictions.
Income restrictions are dependent upon the household size.
Affordable rents starting at $2250, For a household of 1, Gross Annual Income Must be LESS than $99,330.
For a household of 2, Gross Annual Income Must be LESS than $108,100.
Please contact us for more information.

Refrigerator, Cable Ready, Elegant New Flooring, Microwave, Elevator, Air Conditioning/Heating, Relaxing Gas Fireplace, Disposal, Window Coverings, Walk In Closet, Stove/Oven, Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher, Gas Range, Private Balcony

Recycling, Elevator, Gated Access, Assigned Parking - Carport/Garage/Open Space, Laundry Facility in Building, Walking Distance to Fine Dining, Online Maintenance Requests, Close to Upscale Shopping Centers, Onsite and On Call Maintenance, Flexible Lease Terms Available, Controlled Access Entry Building, Professional Management
Certain dog breed restrictions may apply.
Studio Arnaz is an affordable community that has income and rent restrictions.
Income restrictions are dependent upon the household size.
Gross Annual Income for a household of 1 is $99,330.
Gross Annual Income for a household of 2 is $108,100.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
